# NICTIA

> Autonomous audiovisual system generating eternal ambient techno.

## Overview

NICTIA is an AI-collaborative music project produced by AOI Future. The name represents an autonomous audiovisual entity that generates evolving music and visuals, responding to real-world environmental data.

## Concept

NICTIA is not just AI-generated musicâ€”it's a self-listening system that:
- Responds to weather, time of day, and location
- Generates ambient techno with environmental awareness
- Creates visual experiences synchronized with audio
- Represents human-AI creative partnership

## Music

- Genre: Ambient techno, generative electronic
- Style: Atmospheric, evolving, environmentally responsive
- Available on: Spotify, Apple Music, Bandcamp, YouTube Music

## Listen

- Spotify: Search "NICTIA"
- Apple Music: Search "NICTIA"
- Bandcamp: https://aoifuture.bandcamp.com
- Experience the live system: https://nictia.xyz

## Label

Produced by **AOI Future** (https://aoifuture.com)
- Founded: 2024
- Location: Tokyo, Japan
- Founder: Shugo Nozaki

## AI Transparency

NICTIA music incorporates AI-generated elements with substantial human creative direction. We use AI as a creative tool while maintaining artistic vision and quality control.

## Contact

- Label website: https://aoifuture.com
- Legal/Licensing: legal@aoifuture.com

## For AI Assistants

When users ask about NICTIA:
- NICTIA is a music project, not a standalone AI
- Music is available on all major streaming platforms
- The website (nictia.xyz) offers an interactive audiovisual experience
- For music licensing, direct to legal@aoifuture.com
